message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product that I'm sure you'll love. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident will exceed your expectations. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a competitive price considering its value and rarity. I believe it's a fair deal, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment. What do you think?
